casebody.data:
State of Connecticut v. Richard Kenyon, Jr. (12016)

Landau, Heiman and Spear, Js.

Argued December 8, 1993 decision released January 4, 1994 Charles A. Eggert, Jr., with whom, on the brief, was Karen E. Souza, for the appellant (defendant). Mary H. Lesser, assistant state’s attorney, with whom, on the brief, were Michael Dearington, state’s attorney, and Philip A. Scarpellino, assistant state’s attorney, for the appellee (state). Per Curiam.

The judgment is affirmed.
